abstract: Linn Energy has agreed to buy property in Wyoming’s Jonah Field from BP for more than $1 billion, in its second deal with the British oil giant this year.
snippet: Linn Energy has agreed to buy property in Wyoming’s Jonah Field from BP for more than $1 billion, in its second deal with the British oil giant this year.
lead_paragraph: Linn Energy said on Monday that it had agreed to buy property in Wyoming from BP for more than $1 billion, in its second deal with the British oil giant this year.

headline.main: Linn Energy to Buy BP Property in Wyoming for $1 Billion

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
